meanings.sent1: The spy wore an undetectable cloak to hide from enemies.
meanings.sent2: The virus was undetectable by the current technology.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick was to make objects undetectable to the audience.
meanings.sent4: The thief moved through the dark alley like an undetectable shadow.
meanings.sent5: The scent of the flower was undetectable to those with a stuffy nose.

meanings.definition: Not able to be perceived or noticed.
meanings.sent1: The undetectable scent of fresh cookies filled the room.
meanings.sent2: The undetectable sound of the owl's wings startled the mouse.
meanings.sent3: The undetectable ninja moved silently through the room.
meanings.sent4: The undetectable smile on her face hinted at a hidden secret.
meanings.sent5: The undetectable change in the painting went unnoticed by most visitors.
